content: प्रगल्भ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be bold or confident; या कथंचन सखीवचनेन प्रागभिप्रियतमं प्रजगल्भे <ls>Śi. 1. 18</ls>; न मौक्तिकच्छिद्रकरी शलाका प्रगल्भते कर्मणि टंकिकायाः <ls>Vikr. 1. 16</ls> ‘cannot be bold (competent) enough to do the work of a hatchet’. {@--2@} To be determined or resolute. {@--3@} To be proud. {@--4@} To be ready or able (with <ab>inf.</ab>).
